page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: THIS AREA, BEING ONLY 7 MILES FROM HAWICK, TENDS TO HAVE SEVERAL PEOPLE LIVING HERE AND GOING TO THE TOWN FOR WORK. MANY OF THESE PEOPLE HAVE BUSINESSES OF VERY EXACTING WORK i.e. A CARPET FITTER, KNITWEAR MANUFACTURER, COUNCIL EXECUTIVE, CHIMNEY REPAIRER AND THEY SEEK THE PEACE OF THE COUNTRYSIDE WHEN OFF DUTY. SEVERAL OF THE WOMEN HAVE PAID EMPLOYMENT, MAINLY WORKING IN SHOPS. THEN WE HAVE THE PEOPLE WHO WORK IN THE AREA, THE MAJORITY OF WHOM ARE FARMING; THERE BEING TWO FARMHOUSES AND SEVERAL WORKERS' COTTAGES IN THE AREA. THE TOURIST INDUSTRY IS SERVED BY ONE BED AND BREAKFAST ESTABLISHMENT AND ONE HOTEL. THERE ARE A FEW RETIRED FARMING PEOPLE AND ONE PERSON IS UNEMPLOYED DUE TO ILL HEALTH.
